reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan cute and comfortable, with a flattering fit. They appreciate its quality, with one customer noting it's great for late fall. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others mention it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and style
items.body: Soft, comfy sweater that's form-fitted and very stylish. Not too heavy- a great sweater for late fall. I really like the unique assymetrical zipper and metal embellishments. I have a 38" bust and 28" waist and the medium fit me perfectly. Read more
items.author: T.Starr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fitted sweater
items.body: Cute! Finally well even with big boobs. Thin but well made! Read more
items.author: Mikelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unique sweater
items.body: I really like the style of this sweater. Size down. I purchased an xs and am 5'4" and 97 lbs. It is very stretchy and comfortable. Cute rivets and I really like the dual zipper where you can unzip from the top and the bottom. There was a slight snag in the fabric when I received it. Hopefully, that does not mean the material will snag easily. I think it is a little high priced. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase
items.body: Super cute yet comfortable, looks great on, worth the purchase Read more
items.author: sandy tolbert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality sweater
items.body: I’m very pleased with the quality of this sweater. I have not worn it yet but I love the style and fit. Read more
items.author: patty castle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: True to size. Beautiful sweater Read more
items.author: A

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True the size
items.body: Very good and nice fits well Read more
items.author: lynn chaplin

short_description:
Womens Dress Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Olive Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
